content: This finally builds successfully. I imagine that it is rather annoying to review so I wrote quite a long commit message. The new file linear_algebra/matrix/sesquilinear_form was copied from linear_algebra/matrix/bilinear_form and every lemma was changed to curried form of bilinear forms and generalized when it was easily possible (mainly done in the to_matrix' section and not in the to_matrix section).
